title: Animation in the school classroom
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Motion picture industry - Study and teaching
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures - Production and direction - Australia

description: A very detailed film showing students and teachers how animation is possible with a minimum of equipment. It gives advice on what paper to use, methods of production, importance of teamwork, advantages of experiment, how to make a light box, how to make an animation table and the requirements of the camera. Suitable for secondary years 7-12.
